data.title: The Ebersol Family Tragedy-The Lessons They’ve Learned
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from The Oprah Winfrey Show: The Podcast on Spotify. Original Air Date: February 2, 2006Oprah talks to Susan Saint James, Dick Ebersol, and their two sons Charlie and Willie, about the plane crash that Dick and Charlie survived but that claimed the lives of three people, including Susan and Dick's youngest son, Teddy. Want more podcasts from OWN? Visit https://bit.ly/OWNPods  You can also watch Oprah’s Super Soul, The Oprah Winfrey Show and more of your favorite OWN shows on your TV! Visit https://bit.ly/find_OWN
